name: CpublicGold

attributes.name: ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation: Contract function to receive approval and execute function in one call
attributes.name: ApproveAndCallFallBack

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath
Owned

attributes.documentation: Get the token balance for account tokenOwner
attributes.name: balanceOf

attributes.documentation:
Transfer the balance from token owner's account to to account
- Owner's account must have sufficient balance to transfer
- 0 value transfers are allowed
attributes.name: transfer

attributes.documentation:
Token owner can approve for spender to transferFrom(...) tokens
from the token owner's account
attributes.name: approve

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from the from account to the to account

    * - From account must have sufficient balance to transfer
- Spender must have sufficient allowance to transfer
- 0 value transfers are allowed
attributes.name: transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
Returns the amount of tokens approved by the owner that can be
transferred to the spender's account
attributes.name: allowance

attributes.documentation:
Token owner can approve for spender to transferFrom(...) tokens
from the token owner's account. The spender contract function
receiveApproval(...) is then executed
attributes.name: approveAndCall

attributes.documentation: Owner can transfer out any accidentally sent ERC20 tokens
attributes.name: transferAnyERC20Token
